description: Labs Widget Pack - Cumulative timeseries chart w/ custom poll intervals

configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

configuration.name: xFormat
configuration.title: X Axis Date Format (default: hh:mm)
configuration.description: The x-axis format is powered by dayjs. View their documentation for other configuration options.

configuration.name: units
configuration.title: Y-Axis Unit (default: count)
configuration.description: Unit of measurement for data being plotted on the Y-axis.

configuration.name: criticalThreshold
configuration.title: Threshold - Critical
configuration.description: Range of values (or single value) that renders a critical state background

configuration.name: warningThreshold
configuration.title: Threshold - Warning
configuration.description: Range of values (or single value) that renders a warning state background

configuration.name: healthyThreshold
configuration.title: Threshold - Healthy
configuration.description: Range of values (or single value) that renders a healthy state background

configuration.name: enableFilters
configuration.title: Enable dashboard filters
configuration.description: Allows the use of dashboard filters

configuration.name: pollInterval
configuration.title: Poll Interval (default: 60s)
configuration.description: Frequency at which data is refreshed.
